name: 踢擊 (Kick)
description: Kicks the enemy with a chance to stun.

name: 狂暴攻擊 (Berserk)
description: A reckless attack with high damage but low accuracy.

name: 火球術 (Fireball)
description: Hurls a fireball at the enemy.

name: 烈焰風暴 (Firestorm)
description: Summons a storm of fire to burn all enemies.
